Hi there!

My name is Arnault Chatelain, I’m a PhD candidate at CREST and my PhD grant comes from Ecole Polytechnique. I’m also active member of the Computational Social Science Group of the Institut Polytechnique de Paris.

Research Interests

  • Political Economy, Economics of the media
  • Natural Language Processing (NLP) for the Social Sciences

Contact

You can reach out at arnault.chatelain[at]polytechnique.edu
